page.title: 11SPECIAL DAYS IN OUR SCHOOL
page.content: There are many special days at Child's Hill School.{Paul}wrote: On the first day of term everyone is excited. One thing everyone wants to do is talk about what they did in the holiday. {Khizer:}Prize-giving Day is quite a special day for parents and a lot of children who will receive certificates for sport activities,good work or even for helpfulness.{Eric:}Fourty-four different countries are represented by children in our school and to celebrate that we have a special World Children's Day. At morning Assembly children wear their national costumes. Afterwards, the children share the food they have brought.{Lydia:}At our Junior Christmas Party we play games like, The Queen of Sheba, Bus Stops, and Pass the Hat. After play we have party food. Prizes are given for the best boy's and girl's home-made hat.
